title: Account Transferring?
body:
"Your account is in the process of transferring. Please try again in a few minutes. If the issue persists, contact player support" Keeps popping up for me when I try and log into the client. When I try and log into the website it says "Sorry, we couldn't find that combination of username, password, and region". I'm currently on a smurf account, i've had a ticket open for close to 36 hours now with no response. Was just curious if I could get an update or any other help with this. 

Thank you.

replies.body: I tried to find the account you were talking about, but it looks like you might have a few different smurfs and I'm not entirely sure which one is having these sign in issues. Hit me back with the Summoner Name of the account that's stuck transferring and I should be able to help ^_^!
I honestly didn't even know I had more than 2 accounts. But the Summoner name is Fang466

There we are! It does look like someone might have gained control of your account without your permission. I do see your ticket in line, and those account agents will be able to grab it shortly. Keep in mind submitting or updating that ticket will most likely push it back in line.

Would you mind checking on ticket 30412898?

Also - pretty ridiculous that commenting on a ticket pushes it further back in line.

No worries pal! 

I've got your ticket and someone will be looking over it shortly ^_^!
I really appreciate it, thank you.
Oh really? Alright, thank you very much! I'll keep that in mind!
